column4: 3850 Las Vegas Blvd South Las Vegas, NV  89119

column4: 1451 Center Crossing Road Las Vegas, NV  89144
column13: My wife Donna and I had a wonderful lunch at Technique at Le Cordon Bleu - Las Vegas on September 26, 2012. Kay, our waitress who is a student, was very knowledgeable and helpful. When queried, she said on that day she had went to Le Cordon Bleu school from 6:00 to 10:00 AM, then worked as a waitress from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM in the restaurant, then was scheduled to work in the restaurant kitchen from 4:00 to 9:00 PM.
